definitions.definition: Any of various tropical trees of the genus Santalum , native or long naturalized in India , Australia , Hawaii , and many south Pacific islands.
The aromatic heartwood of these trees used in ornamental carving , in the construction of insect - repellent boxes and chests , and as a source of certain perfumes .

main_definition: Any of various tropical trees of the genus Santalum , native or long naturalized in India , Australia , Hawaii , and many south Pacific islands.
